General.Name: Mobile Global Esports Inc.
General.Description: Mobile Global Esports Inc. operates in the esports business. It organizes and commercializes various virtual esports tournaments in India. The company was formerly known as Elite Esports, Inc. and changed its name to Mobile Global Esports Inc. in April 2021. Mobile Global Esports Inc. was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Westport, Connecticut.
